original_text:
Mad Cars
Motori ruggenti
Se dovessimo fare un paragone tra Mad Cars e un film, diremmo che Interceptor calzerebbe a pennello. Conosciuto anche con il nome Mad Max, si tratta di una serie di film usciti tra la fine degli anni Settanta e gli anni Ottanta con protagonista Mel Gibson e che hanno appassionato milioni di teenager in tutto il mondo. In comune con la nostra slot c’è senza dubbio lo scenario post-apocalittico, i potenti bolidi su cui si muovono i predoni e l’aspetto dei personaggi vagamente punk.
Entrando nel dettaglio, la griglia di gioco di Mad Cars si trova in un sito industriale abbandonato, con impalcature in ferro arrugginite e grossi condutture ormai in disuso. La grafica riprende lo stile dei cartoon, con personaggi dai colori brillanti che creano contrasto con quelli opachi dell’ambiente tutt’intorno. Lo scopo è quello di vincere la gara di corsa tra i bolidi partecipanti. Un importante contributo per ricreare la giusta atmosfera arriva dalla colonna sonora, un mix di suoni metallici e industrial, perfetti per la tipologia di gioco.
Una griglia con la forma di una pista
La griglia di Mad Cars ha una forma allungata, avendo 5 rulli, 6 righe e ben 50 linee di pagamento fisse. Per vincere è necessario allineare almeno tre simboli uguali partendo dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra. La scommessa minima è di 0,10 €, un costo contenuto che permette di giocare senza svenarsi. Presenti i giri automatici, da un minimo di 5 a un massimo di 100. La volatilità è media, RTP pari al 96,39%.
Una marea di simboli speciali
I simboli base di Mad Cars sono 8: il cono, la chiave inglese, il volante e i dadi hanno un basso valore, mentre i protagonisti delle corse valgono molto di più.
Durante il gioco regolare, possono atterrare simboli speciali che permettono vincite di alto valore. Vediamoli nel dettaglio:

Instant Prize Car Symbol: questo simbolo può comparire solo nella riga inferiore e hanno un moltiplicatore compreso tra 1x e 100x. Rimane sui rulli sin quando non compare una combo vincente.
The Scatter Car Symbol: anche questo può atterrare solo sulla riga inferiore e ha un valore istantaneo di dieci volte la puntata.
Multiplier Symbols: può essere applicato a un solo simbolo e regala un premio istantaneo compreso tra 2x e 100x.
Gas Symbol: è associato ai primi due bonus e fa aumentare il valore del simbolo
Multiplier & Gas Combo Symbol; unisce i due bonus precedenti
Survivor Symbol: permette di gareggiare senza che l’auto venga sbalzata fuori dai rulli.

La Mad Bonus Feature è una gara tra auto. Vincere la sfida equivale a portarsi a casa una somma molto alta.

Domande Frequenti 
In Mad Cars esistono i simboli Scatter e Wild classici?

No, in questa slot non ci sono Jolly che sostituiscono i simboli o Scatter che regalano giri gratuiti. Questi ultimi sono garantiti da alcune condizioni legate ai Car Bonus.



Ho visto che ci sono molti simboli speciali, è difficile capire la loro funzione?

Seppure all’inizio possa apparire ostico, basterà effettuare qualche giro di prova per familiarizzare con tutti i Bonus.



Posso giocare a Mad Cars su cellulare?

Certo, Mad Cars è disponibile per ogni dispositivo.

raw_translation.response:
Mad Cars
Roaring engines
If we were to compare Mad Cars to a film, we would say that Interceptor fits like a glove. Also known as Mad Max, it is a series of films released between the late 1970s and 1980s starring Mel Gibson that has captivated millions of teenagers around the world. With our slot, there is undoubtedly a post-apocalyptic setting with powerful cars that the raiders move around on and the characters' vaguely punk appearance.

Looking in detail, the Mad Cars game grid is located in an abandoned industrial site, with rusted iron scaffolds and large unused pipes. The graphics follow the style of cartoons, with characters of bright colors that contrast with those of the surrounding environment. The goal is to win the race among participating cars. An important contribution to recreating the right atmosphere comes from the soundtrack, a mix of metallic and industrial sounds, perfect for the type of game.

A grid in the shape of a track
The Mad Cars grid has an elongated shape, with 5 reels, 6 rows, and 50 fixed paylines. To win, it is necessary to align three or more identical symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding to the right. The minimum bet is €0.10, a reasonable cost that allows you to play without going bankrupt. Automatic spins are available, ranging from a minimum of 5 to a maximum of 100. The volatility is moderate, with an RTP of 96.39%.

A plethora of special symbols
Mad Cars' basic symbols are 8: the cone, the wrench, the steering wheel, and the dice have low values, while the race protagonists are worth much more.
During regular play, special symbols can land, allowing for high-value wins. Let's take a closer look:

Instant Prize Car Symbol: this symbol can only appear on the bottom row and has a multiplier ranging from 1x to 100x. It remains on the reels until a winning combo appears.
The Scatter Car Symbol: this can also only land on the bottom row and has an instant value of ten times the bet.
Multiplier Symbols: can be applied to a single symbol and rewards an instant prize ranging from 2x to 100x.
Gas Symbol: associated with the first two bonuses and increases the symbol's value.
Multiplier & Gas Combo Symbol: combines the two previous bonuses.
Survivor Symbol: allows you to race without the car being thrown off the reels.

The Mad Bonus Feature is a race between cars. Winning the challenge is equivalent to bringing home a very high sum.

FAQ
Are there classic Wild and Scatter symbols in Mad Cars?
No, in this slot, there are no Jokers that replace symbols or Scatters that give free spins. The latter are guaranteed by some conditions related to the Car Bonus.

I see there are many special symbols, is it difficult to understand their function?
Although it may seem daunting at first, a few practice spins will suffice to familiarize yourself with all the bonuses.

Can I play Mad Cars on mobile?
Certainly, Mad Cars is available for every device.
raw_translation.role: You are an experienced translator from any language to English.

response.headline: Game Layout and Mechanics
response.content: Mad Cars is a post-apocalyptic themed online slot game with a grid set on an abandoned industrial site with rusted iron scaffolding and large pipes now out of use. The game grid has an elongated shape, featuring 5 reels, 6 rows, and 50 fixed pay lines. To win, it is necessary to align at least three identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right. Players can set their minimum bet at € 0.10, and automatic spins are available both from a minimum of 5 and up to 100. The game features medium volatility and an RTP equal to 96.39%.

response.headline: Special Symbols and Bonus Features
response.content: Mad Cars features 8 basic symbols - the cone, the wrench, the steering wheel, and the dice - of low value and 4 protagonists of high value. In addition to the regular symbols, several special symbols can land that allow for high-value winnings. These include Instant Prize Car Symbol, Scatter Car Symbol, Multiplier Symbols, Gas Symbol, Multiplier & Gas Combo Symbol, and Survivor Symbol. There are no Jokers or Scatters that give free spins in this game; these are guaranteed by some conditions related to the Car Bonus. The Mad Bonus Feature, which is a car race, offers a very high sum for the winner.

response.headline: Winning Potential and Volatility

review_with_topics.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Mad Cars".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Game layout and mechanics
Special symbols and bonus features
Winning potential and volatility
Playable devices and accessibility
Theme and graphics

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: Rumble of Motors 
If we were to compare Mad Cars to a movie, we would say that it fits like a glove with Interceptor. Also known as Mad Max, it is a series of films that came out between the late 70s and the 80s starring Mel Gibson and that have captivated millions of teenagers around the world. What our slot machine undoubtedly has in common with it is the post-apocalyptic scenario, the powerful cars on which the raiders move, and the slightly punk look of the characters.

Looking closer, Mad Cars' game grid is set in an abandoned industrial site with rusted iron scaffolding and large pipes now out of use. The graphics resemble those of cartoon style, with brightly colored characters that contrast with the opaque ones of the environment all around. The goal is to win the race among participating cars. An important contribution to recreate the right atmosphere comes from the soundtrack, a mix of metallic and industrial sounds, perfect for the type of game.

A Grid Shaped Like a Racetrack
Mad Cars' grid has an elongated shape, with 5 reels, 6 rows, and 50 fixed pay lines. To win, it is necessary to align at least three identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right. The minimum bet is € 0.10, an affordable cost that allows for playing without breaking the bank. Automatic spins from a minimum of 5 to a maximum of 100 are present. The volatility is medium, with an RTP equal to 96.39%.

A Flood of Special Symbols
Mad Cars' basic symbols are 8: the cone, the wrench, the steering wheel, and the dice have a low value, while the race protagonists are worth much more.
During regular play, special symbols can land that allow for high-value winnings. Let's look at them in detail:

Instant Prize Car Symbol: this symbol can only appear on the bottom row and has a multiplier ranging from 1x to 100x. It remains on the reels until a winning combo appears.
The Scatter Car Symbol: this too can only land on the bottom row and has an instant value of ten times the bet.
Multiplier Symbols: can be applied to a single symbol and gives an instant prize ranging from 2x to 100x.
Gas Symbol: associated with the first two bonuses and increases the symbol's value.
Multiplier & Gas Combo Symbol: combines the previous two bonuses.
Survivor Symbol: allows to compete without the car being thrown off the reels.

The Mad Bonus Feature is a car race. Winning the challenge is equivalent to taking home a very high sum.

FAQs
Are there classic Scatter and Wild symbols in Mad Cars?

No, in this slot, there are no Jokers that replace symbols or Scatters that give free spins. The latter are guaranteed by some conditions related to the Car Bonus.

I saw that there are many special symbols, is it difficult to understand their function?

Although it may seem challenging at first, it will be enough to make a few trial spins to become familiar with all the bonuses.

Can I play Mad Cars on a cell phone?

Of course, Mad Cars is available for every device.

Mad Cars is a great post-apocalyptic themed game that proves that the end of the world can be a hilariously fun and foolish adventure. With its cartoon-style graphics, Mad Cars is a motley crew of crazy characters that could make even Mad Max roll his eyes.

meta.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
meta.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Mad Cars".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Gameplay Mechanics

Mad Cars has 5 reels, 6 rows, and 50 fixed pay lines. Players need to try to align at least three identical symbols starting from the left reel towards the right. The minimum bet is € 0.10, and automatic spins can be set from as little as 5 up to a maximum of 100. The game is set in an abandoned industrial site with rusted scaffolding and pipes, and it has cartoon-style graphics with brightly colored characters. The game's goal is to win a race among participating cars. The game has medium volatility and an RTP of 96.39%.

Special Symbols

Mad Cars has a total of 8 basic symbols: the cone, wrench, steering wheel, and dice are low-value symbols, while the car race protagonists are high-value. Players can also get their hands on many special symbols: the Instant Prize Car Symbol that appears only on the bottom row and has a multiplier ranging from 1x to 100x; the Scatter Car Symbol, also found only on the bottom row, with an instant value equal to ten times the bet; and, finally, multiplier symbols that can be applied to a single symbol and provide an instant prize ranging from 2x to 100x. 

Bonus Features

Mad Cars has a range of bonuses including the gas symbol, which is associated with the first two bonuses and increases the symbol's value. The multiplier & gas combo symbol combines the previous two bonuses. The survivor symbol allows you to play without being thrown off the reels, and the exciting Mad Bonus Feature is a car race, where winning the challenge is equivalent to taking home a very high sum. In summary, there are many special symbols and bonuses in the game that can lead to high-value prizes.

Volatility and RTP

Mad Cars game has medium volatility and an RTP of 96.39%, making it a fair game with a reasonable chance of a payout. Players can enjoy the game without the fear of losing large amounts of money, as the minimum bet, is € 0.10. With automatic spins that can be set from as little as 5 up to a maximum of 100, players can adjust their gameplay to their bankroll and preferences.

Accessibility

Mad Cars is accessible on virtually any device as it is available for both desktop and mobile platforms. Players can enjoy the game at the comfort of their homes or on the go, ensuring they make the most out of their gaming experience. Overall, Mad Cars is a fun game with excellent gameplay and an exciting range of bonuses that can keep players engaged for hours.

Review: Rumble of Motors 
If we were to compare Mad Cars to a movie, we would say that it fits like a glove with Interceptor. Also known as Mad Max, it is a series of films that came out between the late 70s and the 80s starring Mel Gibson and that have captivated millions of teenagers around the world. What our slot machine undoubtedly has in common with it is the post-apocalyptic scenario, the powerful cars on which the raiders move, and the slightly punk look of the characters.

Looking closer, Mad Cars' game grid is set in an abandoned industrial site with rusted iron scaffolding and large pipes now out of use. The graphics resemble those of cartoon style, with brightly colored characters that contrast with the opaque ones of the environment all around. The goal is to win the race among participating cars. An important contribution to recreate the right atmosphere comes from the soundtrack, a mix of metallic and industrial sounds, perfect for the type of game.

A Grid Shaped Like a Racetrack
Mad Cars' grid has an elongated shape, with 5 reels, 6 rows, and 50 fixed pay lines. To win, it is necessary to align at least three identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right. The minimum bet is € 0.10, an affordable cost that allows for playing without breaking the bank. Automatic spins from a minimum of 5 to a maximum of 100 are present. The volatility is medium, with an RTP equal to 96.39%.

A Flood of Special Symbols
Mad Cars' basic symbols are 8: the cone, the wrench, the steering wheel, and the dice have a low value, while the race protagonists are worth much more.
During regular play, special symbols can land that allow for high-value winnings. Let's look at them in detail:

Instant Prize Car Symbol: this symbol can only appear on the bottom row and has a multiplier ranging from 1x to 100x. It remains on the reels until a winning combo appears.
The Scatter Car Symbol: this too can only land on the bottom row and has an instant value of ten times the bet.
Multiplier Symbols: can be applied to a single symbol and gives an instant prize ranging from 2x to 100x.
Gas Symbol: associated with the first two bonuses and increases the symbol's value.
Multiplier & Gas Combo Symbol: combines the previous two bonuses.
Survivor Symbol: allows to compete without the car being thrown off the reels.

The Mad Bonus Feature is a car race. Winning the challenge is equivalent to taking home a very high sum.

FAQs
Are there classic Scatter and Wild symbols in Mad Cars?

No, in this slot, there are no Jokers that replace symbols or Scatters that give free spins. The latter are guaranteed by some conditions related to the Car Bonus.

I saw that there are many special symbols, is it difficult to understand their function?

Although it may seem challenging at first, it will be enough to make a few trial spins to become familiar with all the bonuses.

Can I play Mad Cars on a cell phone?

Of course, Mad Cars is available for every device.
